definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
decree to grant a special pardon

sentences.english: According to the act of grace many prisoners will be set free.
sentences.chinese: 按照大赦令，很多囚犯獲得釋放。

sentences.english: Final toleration in the edict of Nantes in 1598.
sentences.chinese: 1598年南特赦令宣佈最終信仰自由。

sentences.english: The amnesty, which was brokered by the U.
sentences.chinese: 特赦令是在美國和英國的斡旋之下達成的。

sentences.english: Glyph of Dark Command reduces the chance that your Dark Command (standard taunt) will miss by 8%.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗赦令雕紋減少你黑暗赦令失敗機率8%。

sentences.english: Glyph of Dark Command reduces the chance that your Dark Command (standard taunt) will miss by 8%.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗赦令雕紋減少你黑暗赦令失敗機率8%。

sentences.english: The king decreed a general amnesty.

definition: decree to grant a special pardon
imperial edict/see also 上諭|上谕[shang4 yu4]
